text:
Hi all - i was wondering if someone could point me to the right channel.
I am dealing with non-HubSpot form and this prevent the capture of the data:
```Form has JavaScript bound to the form submit event or submit button click event. This is how the tool captures submissions and any other events, and can prevent HubSpot from knowing when submissions occur.

Form is not using a standard <input type="submit"> button for its form submission. The form must have a standard <input type="submit"> button to capture submissions.```
is there any way top submit to HubSpot with existing click event?
Hi ! Someone is available to add beta to one of my portal ? Thanks a lot in advance :slightly_smiling_face:

Reminder: If it’s been awhile we encourage you to re-review our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|Slack Code of Conduct> which talks about posting the same message to multiple channels and other behaviors. Use Good Judgement, and have HEART. :HubSpotheart:
Anyone know of a way to remove the div wrapper around global partials, or add class(es) to the wrapper?

Hi everyone,

I would like to know why I can’t edit the translations in a module.. I set french as the master one (then I cannot edit it) and it doesn’t even check for the locale to actually make the switch ?

I added the 2 translations I need for the modules and then I click on them to edit the translations but nothing gets reflected in the actual quotes themselves
Hi, how can i intercept the chatbot's messages?

how are you including it? what kind of template is it? If it’s a coded template you can typically add `no_wrapper=true` and that will not wrap it up. If it is an old school template there is a space to add class names on the right hand side of the editor in designt tools when you click on the module/module group/partial that you want to add a class name to

Hey guys i have a table recipes and a child table ingredients. Is there a way to automatically link the right ingredients to the recipe without doing it all manually? Because i have alot od recipes at the moment and it’s getting really hard to do so. Any ideas??
